sub_topic: Identifying the planarity of a graph.
message_1:
Consider the graph given below:

```
  A -- B
  |    | \
  |    |  \
  C -- D -- E
```

What is the planarity of this graph?
message_2: The graph given is planar. A graph is planar if it can be drawn in a plane without any edges crossing each other. In this case, the graph can be drawn without any edge crossings.
